author: gloslegofan
title: Decent little Helicopter
review:
Box/Instructions

A polybag with the helicopter shown flying over a mountainous background.

The instructions are a standard folded single sheet with 16 build steps.

Parts

47 parts, none are particularly rare or unusual. The two white Brick 1X2 W. 2 Knobs are always handy to have.

The completed model

As you would expect for a Creator set, the model is fairly realistic despite the small piece count. The model looks like it could be a fairly small helicopter, perhaps like a Robinson R44 or similar, although the model does suggest that it has turbines/turboshafts. The main and tail rotors can be spun, and there are a few nice details such as a tailight. The colours (blue and white) suggest this could potentially be a police helicopter. The set is very similar to the 2010 Creator Mini Helicopter 5864.

Overall opinion

A decent little Creator Helicopter.
